g.text: 生机系统（Entelechy System）之四互动

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 103px; margin-left: 311px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 373px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 643px; margin-left: 311px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 373px; margin-left: 581px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 181px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 58px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 196px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Elemental Conception System 基本概念系统。其使人们认知整个世界之运作规律，暨观照世界。
人生体是其观照之源泉。世界体是观照之对象。人生观影响观照之走向。人生体基于世界体，以人生观为指导，运行人生，从而观照世界。

switch.text: 观照世界Elemental Conception System 基本概念系统。其使人们认知整个世界之运作规律，暨观照世界。...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 210px; height: 1px; padding-top: 116px; margin-left: 472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 162px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
观照人生
Life Management System 人生管理系统。其使人们认识自己在生命周期中的意义、价值、追求，暨观照人生。世界观是其观照之源泉。人生体是其观照之对象。世界体影响其观照之走向。
人生体基于世界体，以世界观为基础，运行人生，从而观照人生。

switch.text: 观照人生Life Management System 人生管理系统。其使人们认识自己在生命周期中的意义、价值、追求，暨观照人生。世界观是其观照之源泉。人生体是其观照之对象。世界体影响其观照之走向。...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 471px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 124px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

h1.p: Agents World System 多主体世界系统。其是世界各人生体与自然界相互运行的实体。其基于在人生观指导下的人生体，通过世界观，实现运行世界体。

switch.text: 运行世界 Agents World System 多主体世界系统。其是世界各人生体与自然界相互运行的实体。其基于在人生观指导下的人生体，通过世界观，实现运行世界体。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 153px; height: 1px; padding-top: 441px; margin-left: 78px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 165px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Complex Intelligence System 复杂智能体系统。其是人们认知、运作人生的实体基础。其基于世界体，由世界观为基础，人生观为指导，实现运行人生。

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
